vote.title: Authorize a contract with Peyton Harshfield, sole proprietor, for the fabrication and installation services for site-specific artwork at Tipton Park located at 3607 Magdeline St., Dallas, Texas 75212 - Not to exceed $113,000.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
